text: Entrapeer Gives You Access to Everything You Need to Reliably Scale Your Business Into the Future United States - December 28, 2023 / Entrapeer / Tech and the internet have changed how people do things, including business. Today, digital technologies and systems have been integrated into systems to enhance operations and workflow. One of the biggest game changers is enterprise innovation platforms like Entrapeer. These help the company propel innovation efforts and identify emerging technologies, market potential, and trends. All this saves you time and money and streamlines a business’s processes. Let’s take a look at the benefits of using a quality [enterprise innovation platform](https://entrapeer.com/about/). Foster Diversity and Inclusivity A company is as good as its culture. With an enterprise innovation platform, you can conveniently nurture market strengths and support growth ambitions in a well-targeted manner. Since the systems are open to everyone involved, it ensures that inclusivity and diversity are respected. This enhances the relationships at the workplace while allowing everyone to float their opinions regarding innovation and progress. Even better, having one common platform opens up organizational space, allowing innovators to bypass the regular hierarchies and barriers of power. This cultivates better relationships and creates a good innovation culture. Enhance Quality Decision-Making Gone are the days when companies would make decisions based on hearsay. With an enterprise innovation platform, the organization receives data-driven insights. You get to process different amounts of data quickly, thus giving your business a competitive edge. Companies can use the system to scan and collect data from verified sources and centralize their research. All this builds a unified ecosystem of legitimate insights. You can use the insight to make quality decisions and take your business to the next level. Enable Better Collaboration There is a lot that goes into making an organization successful. It starts with making the employees happy and comfortable before moving on to the clients. If your employees or staff members are psychologically safe, they can collaborate well and serve clients even better. Enterprise innovation platforms foster participation and collaboration. Since innovation contains a huge number of social touchpoints, collaboration is inevitable. They require diverse perspectives and a balance between intuition and creativity. This means that the employees must truly connect with their thoughts and expertise. If issues arise, the innovation platform can help them solve them internally or externally, depending on the extent. For instance, you may have an extra professional helping them achieve cohesion. Establish Scalability Every person or organization gets in business to scale upwards. In today’s tech world, you need to get real-time market insights to fuel fact-based innovation. With systems like Entrapeer, you can easily get instant market research and accelerate your start-up scouting. It ensures maximum ROI (Return on Investment) by synthesizing complex details into actionable content for your business. Whatever growth you want to achieve is possible with Entrapeer. Contact Entrapeer Today to Transform Your Organization’s Innovation Setup Are you ready to transform your business and improve innovativeness? Well, at Entrapeer, innovation brings you closer to the largest user case database across the globe. The Entrapeer [enterprise innovation platform](https://entrapeer.com/) gives instant and actionable market insights from more than 200 global sources. Regardless of your technology or industry, you can be sure that the information you get is real-time. Contact Entrapeer today and keep yourself ahead of the competition! author: JJ Staff
title: Miley Cyrus Makes Rare Outing With Boyfriend Maxx Morando to Attend Concert in LA | Maxx Morando, Miley Cyrus | Just Jared: Celebrity News and Gossip | Entertainment
text: Miley Cyrus Makes Rare Outing With Boyfriend Maxx Morando to Attend Concert in LA [Miley Cyrus](https://www.justjared.com/tags/miley-cyrus/) is all smiles while making a rare outing with her boyfriend [Maxx Morando](https://www.justjared.com/tags/maxx-morando/) in Los Angeles. On Wednesday night (September 18), the 31-year-old “Flowers” pop star and her longtime love were spotted heading to the Future Islands concert. For the occasion, Miley was dressed simply in an oversized sweater and black pants. She pulled her hair back with a clip. Keep reading to find out more… Maxx wore a pair of white pants and a sweater with a graphic on it. This marks one of the few times that Miley and Maxx have been spotted out together in 2024. Although they’ve been dating since late 2021, they famously keep their relationship out of the spotlight. They were [photographed together](https://www.justjared.com/2024/02/04/miley-cyrus-still-going-strong-with-boyfriend-maxx-morando-he-joins-her-backstage-at-grammys-2024/) in February at the 2024 Grammy Awards, where Miley [won her first-ever Grammy](https://www.justjared.com/2024/02/04/miley-cyrus-wins-her-first-grammy-accepts-best-pop-solo-performance-trophy-from-mariah-carey/)! Back in June, a source provided an update on [where the couple stands](https://www.justjared.com/2024/06/15/miley-cyrus-maxx-morando-relationship-update-source-reveals-how-private-couple-is-doing/). Did you see that Miley was recently [hit by a lawsuit](https://www.justjared.com/2024/09/17/miley-cyrus-sued-by-bruno-mars-copyright-company-for-flowers-claiming-when-i-was-your-man-similarity/) over one of her hit songs? Scroll through the photos of Miley Cyrus and Maxx Morando… [Backgrid](https://backgridusa.backgrid.com/)Posted to: [Maxx Morando](https://www.justjared.com/tags/maxx-morando/), [Miley Cyrus](https://www.justjared.com/tags/miley-cyrus/)

author: Anne Rogers
title: New Royals pitchers throw first Spring Training bullpens
text: 'It’s super exciting': New signings impress in first bullpen SURPRISE, Ariz. -- [Seth Lugo](https://www.mlb.com/player/607625) and [Michael Wacha](https://www.mlb.com/player/608379), two of the Royals' major signings this offseason, threw off the mound for the first time with their new team on Thursday. Lugo, who signed a [two-year deal](https://www.mlb.com/royals/news/seth-lugo-royals-free-agent-deal), threw to catcher Salvador Perez, while Wacha, who signed a [one-year pact](https://www.mlb.com/royals/news/michael-wacha-deal-with-royals), had Freddy Fermin as his backstop. Perez also caught closer [Will Smith](https://www.mlb.com/player/will-smith-519293), who also [signed with Kansas City this past offseason](https://www.mlb.com/royals/news/will-smith-royals-free-agent-deal). The Royals’ veteran catcher has quite a few new arms to learn this spring. “I’m super excited about these guys,” Perez said. “They know how to pitch in the big leagues. I can’t wait for the first game in Spring Training and the first of the season. I think we’ll do much better this year with these pitchers. I’ve done a lot of talking with these guys, try to have a good relationship with them. Trying to be on the same page with them, what they’re trying to throw and what part of my body they want to throw to, so when the time comes for the game, we’re on the same page. It’s super exciting.” Additional notes • The Royals are expecting lefty Angel Zerpa and catcher Rodolfo Durán to arrive in Arizona on Thursday afternoon and be in camp on Friday. Zerpa is scheduled for his first bullpen Friday morning. Durán and Zerpa's arrivals were delayed due to visa/passport issues. • Lefty Austin Cox, who tore his left ACL last September, has had a speedy recovery so far. He is already throwing bullpens and threw a light one on Thursday morning. He’s still being cautious, especially with running, but he’s optimistic about his chances to return to the mound this year. Cox was non-tendered this offseason, but the Royals wanted him to stay in the organization and signed him to a Minor League deal with a non-roster invite to Spring Training. He’ll continue his recovery in Arizona while the team is here this spring.
